title: 5 Quick Steps to Sync Contacts to Gmail With Android

steps.title: Open your device's Settings.
steps.content: Open your device's Settings. It's an app that is likely shaped like a gear (⚙️) or one that contains a set of sliders.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Accounts.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Accounts . It's under the "Personal" section of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Google.
steps.content: Tap Google . The accounts are listed alphabetically.

steps.title: Slide the "Contacts" button to the "On" (right) position.
steps.content: Slide the "Contacts" button to the "On" (right) position. It will turn bluish-green. Now your Gmail contacts will sync with your Android contacts.

steps.title: Click on the other Google options that you want to sync.
steps.content: Click on the other Google options that you want to sync. These include Calendar, Photos, and Music.
